key.name: session-key
key.description: Saves the Last.fm session key to connect to Last.fm.

key.name: play-count-active
key.summary: If the playcount sync should be active or not.
key.description: Determines if the playcount syncronization with Last.fm should be active or not.

key.name: loved-active
key.summary: If the loved tracks should be synced or not.
key.description: Determines if the loved tracks on Last.fm should be synced (marked with 5 stars) on rhythmbox.

key.name: fingerprinter-active
key.summary: If the fingerprinter should be enabled.
key.description: Determines if the fingerprinter module should be enabled and avaible for it's use on the application.

key.name: connected
key.summary: If the plugin is connected with LastFM or not.
key.description: Determines if the plugin is actually connected with LastFM or not. It's also used as communication medium between the config dialog and the plugin itself to manage the connection.
